slots.name: Registration
slots.description: Registration will start at 8am. If you are a planning to take a session, please be there by 8am as the slots are available only on first come first serve basis

slots.name: Introduction
slots.description: This your chance to learn how Barcamp is different for your regular conference. Veterans please take time to educate the new participants about the philosphy of the event

sessions.title: Healthcare Blockchain’d
sessions.description: Just as it has disrupted and improved so many other industries, the blockchain is set to transform healthcare for the better in 2018, and well into the future. Patient records have been stored digitally by doctors for years, and a wealth of data, including medical research and information on patient outcomes, has already been gathered. […] Read more

sessions.title: Why Failing teaches you the best lessons in your life?
sessions.description: Ever wondered what failure can do to you? It is a much more powerful experience that will shape you for a greater success that comes in your journey. The experience of failing is absolutely irreplaceable, let’s recover from our failures and stand upon ourselves. Read more

sessions.title: The Legend of Tolkien and Computer Games
sessions.description: The works of J.R.R. Tolkien and it’s influence on modern Computer Games through Dungeons & Dragons. J.R.R Tolkien was more a world-builder than an author. His posthumously published works and drafts on shaping the legendarium of Middle Earth vastly dwarf his largest published and most well-known work: The Lord of The Rings. What we often […] Read more

sessions.title: Lego Serious Play
sessions.description: Lego Serious Play is a platform where Lego Blocks are used to describe the team discussions, newer dimensions to the project management and increase the creativity quotient of the team to stimulate the brain towards working for a better understanding of the outcome and to mend the relationship between participants Session Difficulty: discussion Read more

sessions.title: Let’s know and Let’s do using SETU ATA211G – IVR
sessions.description: Introduction to Interactive voice response(IVR) using Matrix SETU ATA211G device and how we can implement this for residential as well as office purpose. Session Difficulty: intro Read more

slots.name: Break 1
slots.description: First Break. Have tea/coffee and meet with people. Interesting conversations brew up in the breaks

sessions.title: Productivity hacks for the lazy & unfocused
sessions.description: We live in a world where distractions are always a click or glance away. The very devices, technology, and environments that were supposed to make life easier have made it harder to concentrate and get shit done. This session will be an interactive discussion on the tips, hacks, and frameworks that have helped me (and […] Read more

sessions.title: Deep Learning and Security
sessions.description: Are the so called smart Deep Learning based products safe and secure? What type of new loopholes do they create? Adversarial examples is a known issue where images can be perturbed to fool deep learning systems into believing they are something else. For example, the above image of a temple is recognized as Ostrich (Credits: Christian Szegedy et al) […] Read more

sessions.title: Designing for Design Education
sessions.description: Discussing project-and-activity-based-learning using some of my personal experiments in teaching some abstract ideas, topics, and concepts in design through activities. Session Difficulty: discussion Read more

sessions.title: Selling on Amazon
sessions.description: Like many of you reading this, I am a total geek. That means that I can’t sell anything. But now I do – I sell keychains on amazon.in (under the name “Custom Objects”). Here’s one of the products ! I also sell the same at engrave.in . In this session, I will give an overview […] Read more

sessions.title: Nanorobots used in surgeries
sessions.description: Have anyone of us wondered a nanorobot in the form of a capsule? Researchers at MIT are working on this project and have demonstrated a tiny origami robot that can unfold itself from a swallowed capsule and crawl across the stomach due to external magnetic fields to remove foreign particles. There are robotic surgeries being […] Read more

sessions.title: Beyond Blockchain – An Introduction to IOTA
sessions.description: Blockchain is the hype word in the entire world right now. But, due to that, there are similar distributed technology that often get overlooked. IOTA Tangle comes up with solutions to this massive industry. I’m going to cover a brief intro on Tangle and it’s advantages over Blockchain and why it will become the next […] Read more

sessions.title: Crypto-economics : An Intro
sessions.description: Blockchain and ICOs are the new buzzword of our times. But the real potential of blockchain lies in providing a new incentivisation mechanism through crypto-tokens. Cryptoeconomics is the branch which deals with design of mechanisms for incentivising desired goals in a blockchain based systems. I will talk about my journey trying to learn this subject […] Read more

sessions.title: Maths Is Fun
sessions.description: We will talk about how creative and fun mathematics truly is. And how hard it is to teach it the right way. Many of us have been excluded from this source of joy and beauty by bad teachers and bad schools. We hope to be able to rekindle some of it. In this session, we […] Read more

sessions.title: Managing my home server using Terraform and Docker
sessions.description: Presentation: https://www.beautiful.ai/deck/-L4w5j_sJ9XkKnzf1OXt/Terraforming-my-Home-Server Source Code: https://github.com/captn3m0/nebula I’ve been running a low-availability Home Server setup for the past 4 months on a PC Build in Bangalore. I’ve written about my experience in a series of blog posts which I’ll be summarizing for the talk. If you’re interested in my self-hosting setup, I’m using Terraform + Docker, the […] Read more

sessions.title: CLI text processing
sessions.description: Rough plan for the session overview of cli text processing tools common pitfalls, online searching tips examples will be shown – suggest to bring laptop to follow along repo: https://github.com/learnbyexample/Command-line-text-processing The session is suited for anyone working with text documents – from finding text to search and replace, from sorting to beautifying text and more Commands that’d […] Read more

sessions.title: Facts and Fallacies of Growth Hacking
sessions.description: An interactive session covering misconceptions about “Growth” as well as the mindset, framework & tools needed for Growth Hacking Engineering. I will share the real-world growth tactics that we implemented at Indian startups. “Growth hacks” drive viral growth early in a product’s path to product-market fit. However, a scientific approach to growth is needed to sustain long-term […] Read more

sessions.title: Technology & Heritage #InscriptionStonesOfBangalore
sessions.description: #InscriptionStonesOfBangalore is a civic activism project to raise awareness and protect ancient inscription stones (shila shaasanas) found in the Bengaluru region. Inscriptions stones are original documentation of the people, culture, religion and language of the region dating back to as early as 750CE. Rampant urbanization in Bengaluru has led to destruction of a majority of […] Read more

slots.name: Lunch
slots.description: Lunch Hour. Give the brain a rest and feed the stomach

slots.name: Techlash
slots.description: Techlash is barcamp on rapidfire. Quick 6 min sessions showcasing amazing stuff people have been working on.

sessions.title: You, yes you, you are doing REST wrong!
sessions.description: URI patterns like /store/{storeId}/order/{orderId} does not a REST API make.   The session is going to be an eye opener about what REST is, contrasted with what people usually think it is. After a 40,000 feet overview, I plan to go into detail – Why REST, where is the value? What is REST? How to make your […] Read more

sessions.title: Introduction to Abstract Designs!! and how you do it.
sessions.description: Are you passionate about visual designing, join us on 10th Feb for demo followed by discussions Extra if you have a laptop, and we can do a Hands-on. Aditya Niranjan will be our guide through the session with some awesome creativity to go along. Session Difficulty: intro Read more

sessions.title: Digital Inclusion Why and How
sessions.description: Digital Inclusion: How can you make your mobile / web content available to every one including those with disabilities. Why? Because 15% of world’s population has some kind of disability. Considerable number of population adds to this due to age old difficulties and temporary disabilities. Session Difficulty: intro Read more

sessions.title: Unteaching
sessions.description: Who came up with the existing school structure? Who decided what a person can learn at a certain age? Who decided what is the best way to teach a subject? I’ll be sharing my thinking on these and what a learning environment needs to be. Session Difficulty: intro Read more

sessions.title: Who’s water is it anyway?
sessions.description: Introductory talk about today’s water and wastewater challenges in India and across the globe. Some insights into how to manage your own water at home. Session Difficulty: intro Read more

sessions.title: Introduction to Ethereum Blockchain and smart contracts
sessions.description: Starters guide to blockchain, smart contracts and cryptocurrencies. Session Difficulty: intro Read more

slots.name: Break 2
slots.description: Second Break. Have tea/coffee and meet with people. Interesting conversations brew up in the breaks

sessions.title: Raspberry Pi – Why you should have one at home
sessions.description: Raspberry Pi is pretty awesome computer IMHO. I have one running on my home network. It can just be your own private linux server for all your wants, which can connect to your TV for entertainment. Here are a few things I have been able to run off it. 1. PiHole – https://pi-hole.net/ – Adblockers […] Read more

sessions.title: Effort Estimation
sessions.description: Why does ANY project/task always take longer than planned? What to do when your manager asks you for an ETA? How to get better at estimating the effort involved? Session Difficulty: introPresentation Link: https://www.slideshare.net/cvs26/effort-estimation-73647698 Read more

sessions.title: The Beauty of Numbers
sessions.description: What makes number theory so beautiful? We attempt to give an answer by posing some simple but interesting questions. We will also answer these questions with interesting proofs. Session Difficulty: in-depth_discussions Read more

sessions.title: How can IOT Revolutionise Farming
sessions.description: How we can help farmers from technology (IOT). Session Difficulty: discussion Read more

sessions.title: From Hyrule to Munchkins
sessions.description: Games serve purposes beyond entertainment, engagement and exploration. It is an immensely powerful medium that helps people escape and operate in a universe that is, to put it simply, unimaginable for them to exist in, keeping in purview our existing notion of reality. This discourse deals with a discussion on the following points. […] Read more

sessions.title: We don’t like testing? Don’t we?
sessions.description: I chose testing career as a college drop-out. Ask me about the things I do, things I am working on. A team in Bangalore adding innovation, technology to testing. See what and how we did it! Session Difficulty: discussion Read more

sessions.title: Kite: DIY 3D Printed Smartphones
sessions.description: Kite is a DIY kit that lets makers build their own custom smartphone, and more. Kite is the world’s first DIY modular smartphone platform. With Kite, off-the-shelf electronics components (sensors, displays, batteries), and a 3D printer, you can build your own custom device… which could be more than just a smartphone. More details are at […] Read more

sessions.title: How does our brain’s GPS work?
sessions.description: How do we store episodic memories (memory related to specific events in our life like marriage, the first day of school etc)? What goes on in our brain when we experience a new environment? How does our brain solve the challenge of spatial navigation? The session will try to provide an insight on the above […] Read more

sessions.title: 10X growth with the best sales practices
sessions.description: An interactive session for entrepreneurs and salespeople involving A look at various sales strategies used by businesses. Discussion on factors that affect productivity and culture inside sales teams. Discussion about improving throughput and conversion. Role of technology in impacting sales output. Future of sales. Session Difficulty: discussion Read more

sessions.title: What I learnt from production service meltdowns
sessions.description: It was my first professional sysops job. I’d been doing SysOps at a volunteer basis, but the new opportunity had come and I’d grabbed it. Few months into it, I was doing great – till suddenly – disaster. Production services went down. And it was all my fault. Join me in finding out what I […] Read more

sessions.title: What’s in a name? Lets talk DNS
sessions.description: What exactly is happening when you open your browser and type www.google.com? We’ll walk through the amazefest of our times called DNS. And talk about how to run your own DNS resolver so you know your DNS queries are safe… Session Difficulty: intro Read more

slots.name: Feedback
slots.description: Feedback Session. In a BCB tradition we all meet at the end of the day and talk about what was good and what can be done better
